name: Star Runner (Ben James)
description:
A remote solar observatory has been struck by a shooting star and its reactor damaged. Find the reactor and stabilise it before the whole observatory falls in the sun.

Made for Weekly Game Jam - Week 135

Controls
movement - ARROW KEYS
jump - X
display map - M
quit game - Q

Or you can try using a gamepad (can be glitchy)

Follow me on Twitter
